original_text: Thou sawest till that a stone was cut out without hands, which smote the image upon his feet that were of iron and clay, and brake them to pieces.
korean_text: 또 왕이 보신즉 손대지 아니한 돌이 나와서 신상의 쇠와 진흙의 발을 쳐서 부서뜨리매

sentences.original_text: Thou sawest till that a stone was cut out
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 돌이 잘려 나가는 것을 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: which smote the image upon his feet
that were of iron and clay
sentences.korean_translation: 그 발들은 철과 진흙으로 되어 있었습니다
